decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 23646_P_002 Site Block Plan; 23646_P_003_01 Existing Floor Plans and Elevations (34, 36, 38 Blandford Road); 23646_P_003_03 Existing Floor Plans and Elevations (33, 35, 37 Blandford Road); 23646_P_004_01 Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations (34, 36, 38 Blandford Road); 23646_P_004_03 Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations (33, 35 Blandford Road); 23646_P_005_03 Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations (37 Blandford Road)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be identical to what stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Installation of external wall insulation with a rendered finish to the front-facing cladded areas on the existing clerestory roof; replacement of existing roof with warm roof system with GRP or similar finish; replacement of existing front facing window on the clerestory roof; raising the existing roof ridge; and replacement of existing windows and doors (at No. 37 only) (Joint Application)
